com.artemis

Class AspectSubscriptionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
      • com.artemis.AspectSubscriptionManager

  • @SkipWire
public class AspectSubscriptionManager
extends BaseSystem
    Manages all instances of EntitySubscription. Entity subscriptions are automatically updated during World.process(). Any | listeners are informed when entities are added or removed.
    See Also:
    EntitySubscription

        protected void initialize()

        Override to implement code that gets executed when systems are initialized. Note that artemis native types like systems, factories and component mappers are automatically injected by artemis.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class BaseSystem

      • get

        public EntitySubscription get(Aspect.Builder builder)
        Get subscription to all entities matching Aspect. Will create a new subscription if not yet available for given Aspect match.
        Parameters:
        builder - Aspect to match.
        Returns:
        EntitySubscription for aspect.

      • getSubscriptions

        public ImmutableBag<EntitySubscription> getSubscriptions()
        Gets the active list of all current entity subscriptions. Meant to assist in tooling/debugging.
        Returns:
        All active subscriptions.
